english.segment1: I can hear the footsteps. of my King. I can hear his. heartbeat beckoning. In my darkness. He has set me free. Now I hear the. spirit calling me
english.segment2: He's calling. Wake up child. It's your turn to shine. You were born. for such a time as this. (2x). Such a time as this
english.segment3: I can hear a holy rumbling. I've begun to preach. another king. Loosing chains and. breaking down the walls. I want to hear the Father when he calls.
english.segment4: He's calling. Wake up child. It's your turn to shine. You were born. for such a time as this (3x). Such a time as this
english.segment5: This is the anthem. of our generation, Here we are God. Shake our nation. All we need is your love. You captivate me. (3x)
english.segment6: I am royalty. I have destiny. I have been set free. I'm gonna shake history
